com.communote.server.web.fe.portal.controller

Class SecurityCodeConfirmationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.fe.portal.controller.SecurityCodeConfirmationHandler

  • public abstract class SecurityCodeConfirmationHandler
extends Object
    Handler for confirming a specific security code.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurityCodeConfirmationHandler(SecurityCodeAction action)
      Create a new handler for the given action

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecurityCodeConfirmationHandler

        public SecurityCodeConfirmationHandler(SecurityCodeAction action)
        Create a new handler for the given action
        Parameters:
        action - the action of the security code this handler can handle

    • Method Detail

      • confirm

        public abstract SecurityCodeConfirmationResult confirm(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                       SecurityCode code)
                                                throws SecurityCodeNotFoundException,
                                                       IOException
        Confirm the code.
        Parameters:
        request - the current request
        response - the current response
        code - the code to confirm
        Returns:
        the result of the confirmation or null if the handler has already send an appropriate response within this method
        Throws:
        SecurityCodeNotFoundException - in case the code was removed in the meantime
        IOException - in case this handler wrote to the response and this caused an error

      • getAction

        public SecurityCodeAction getAction()
        Returns:
        the action of the security code this handler can handle

      • getWarningForMissingCode

        public LocalizedMessage getWarningForMissingCode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                 String code)
        Return a message that should be shown as warning to the user if the action of this handler was provided but the code did not exist. This can for instance occur if a confirmation link is opened a second time.
        Parameters:
        request - the current request
        code - the code that could not be found
        Returns:
        the message or null if this case should not be handled specifically
